Reviews.Title: “Great value for money & location”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights husband mum dad husband ran marathon sunday reported pretty basic clean functionable balcony looked cross roads 5th floor 6 total reception staff helpful brekfast tiny getting table offerings typical european potato tortilla yummy cake holiday location suited 10 mins familia 5 mins metro stop hospital de sant pau metro hotel busy centre easily accessable metro bought 4 day metro ticket 22 euros moneys worth plenty restaurants minutes walk visit city absolutely loved 5 days couple fab weather added bonus

Reviews.Content: fantastic location lovely walk sagrada familia past lovely tapas ars restaurants bus stop corner easy metro stop easy reception staff friendly helpful advising attractions clean adequate storage complaint hotel morning 7 oclock woken cleaning staff talk drag furniture alot noise consideration guests

Reviews.Content: priced midrange perfectly located hotel balcony bathroom flat screen comfortable hotel walking distance park guell 25 minutes sagrada familia 7 minutes little road hit famous houses la ramblas 45 minutes friendly staff free wifi can’t wrong

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable and affordable!”
Reviews.Author: SusieWibbs
Reviews.Content: arrived little concerned hotel looks centre 2 star possibly 2 star hotel stayed reception staff friendly helpful breakfast perfectly adequate omelette cheeses hams salamis cereals fruit breads yoghurts pastries space comfortable clean bathroom location sagrada familia 10mins walk strolling metro station 5 mins walk easy city little hotel fantastic value negative wasnt huge thin walls light sleeper hear door

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, good location, small room”
Reviews.Author: Garonia
Reviews.Content: hotel located near sagrada familia easy reach 1015 mins metro night bus la rambla reception staff friendly helpful definitely hotels assets particularly comfortable bed hard bathroom clean noise looked onto inner buildings basically fire escapes view existant noise parking spaces available nearby indoor car park pay extra 17 euros night

Reviews.Title: “Tiny and somewhat smelly room, noisy building, good front desk staff.”
Reviews.Author: TropicalTraveler78
Reviews.Content: id stay closer las ramblas spend little money pay 262 4 nights price doubt balcony decent view travelers building extremely noisy walls doors paper thin jackhammering outside road construction intersection hotel overlooks reasonably clean smelled sewer im air freshener fyi safe charge 3 day fit laptop desk staff excellent bilingual friendly helpful quick respond guest breakfast indeed overpriced attendant bored job lazy close cheaper location main attractions exception sagrada familia metro isnt avenida gaudi eat youd staying closer city center save money stay step hostel

Reviews.Content: noisy building youll hear door building slam toilet flush staff care avoid loud talking outside start morning bathroom nice comfortable nice blackout curtains soundproof windows street noise breakfast overpriced slow careless service location

Reviews.Content: clean hotel excellent friendly staff fairly central location public transport close free internet access unfortunately air conditioning operates 6 months 1st visit outside period weather unusually hot stifling solution sleep window wide lot traffic noise else plus
